Sarah Jamison
=============

[City Council Members](https://www.snydertx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=18)
Title: Council Member - At-Large
Phone:
325-207-2883
[Email Sarah Jamison](mailto:sjamison@snydertx.gov)

Two-year term expiring in 2027.
Mayor Pro-Tem
